ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 3: Deal With The Devil
ComicInfo.Summary:
Through trickery and guile, Tonto and The Lone Ranger foil the evil ranchers' land grab, forcing them to turn to the deadliest bounty hunter in the west- a fop, a dandy, and a cannibal named Connor.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | John Cassaday | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 13:29:58. [CVDB694845]
ComicInfo.Characters: Arch, Calvin Pringle, Donald Metz, Lemuel Connor, Lone Ranger, Millie, Tonto
